song.title: Mandaram Kathawe
song.content:
[Intro/Inter] ------------------------------------------------ |[E] |[-] |[B] |[-] | |[C#m] |[-] |[-] |[-] | |[B] |[-] |[A] |[-] | |[C#m] |[-] |[-] |[-] |
[Verse 1] ------------------------------------------------
[C#m] [E] [C#m] [E] Nil nuwan hasa kalum - Pawasamin pem hagum [Abm] [A] [B] Jeewithaye yawwanaye dakina [C#m] [E] [C#m] [E] Sura ladun senehasin - Mage pathum sanasamin [Abm] [A] [B] Ma denethe ma manase radunaa
[Chorus] ------------------------------------------------
[E] [B] [C#m] Hada salena raye hima sisile [B] [A] [C#m] Rahase ahase atha ime [E] [B] [C#m] Muthu warusa saluna thama mawe [B] [A] [C#m] Nobidee nomakee e mathake
[Verse 2] ------------------------------------------------
[C#m] [E] [C#m] [E] Sithu lesin sanasemin - Nidahasin nalawemin [Abm] [A] [B] Mage diviye e yugaye thibuna [C#m] [E] [C#m] [E] Dahasakin suwa dasun - Pahasakin lada rasin [Abm] [A] [B] Mohanaye thathsaraye baduna
